description_ro: Organizezi un eveniment cu vanzare de prajituri pentru scoala din cartier.
description_en: You're arranging an event with cake selling for the neighborhood school.

description_ro: Prietenii tai blanosi de la adapostul pentru animale vor fi recunoscatori.
description_en: Your fluffy friends from the animal shelter will thank you.

description_ro: Dai bairam ca vecinii sa se cunoasca intre ei si ceri taxa de intrare. Incaseaza 10 de la fiecare jucator.
description_en: You're holding a party for neighbor bonding and you request entry tax. Take 10 from every player.

description_ro: Donezi sange si primesti cashback la STB si Metrorex.
description_en: You're donating blood and receive cashback for STB and Metrorex.

description_ro: Asculti povestile din tinerete ale vecinului pensionar si iti da 100 de sanatatea fiicei lui.
description_en: You listen to your neighbor's teenage stories and he gives you 100 to the health of his daughter.

description_ro: Cumperi doua gume la bucata in Pipera
description_en: You're buying two chewing gums in Pipera

description_ro: Te-au prins fara bilet in tramvai fix inainte sa te dai jos si primesti suprataxa.
description_en: You've been caught with no ticket in the tram right when leaving and receive overtax.

description_ro: Ti-a respins o fata intalnirea si te apuci de sala sa te faci mare. Dureaza doua ture si banii se retin la START.
description_en: One girl rejected your date and you're subscribing to the gym to get big. It lasts two laps and the fee is retained at START.

description_ro: Dai un shot in club si nu observi ca barmanul a trecut un 0 in plus pe POS.
description_en: You're buying a shot in the club and you don't notice that the barman set one extra 0 on the POS.

description_ro: Te-a convins prietenul tau sa bagi 10 la aparate si castigi.
description_en: You're gambling 10 because your buddy said so and you win.

description_ro: Duci masina la spalatorie automata si uiti sa inchizi geamurile. Stai o tura sa o impingi la service si platesti 100.
description_en: You go to automatic car wash and forget to raise the windows. Wait a turn to push it to the service and pay 100.

description_ro: Ajuti vecina sa care cumparaturile si iti gateste in schimb, scapandu-te de o cheltuiala.
description_en: You help your neighbor carry the bags from the supermarket and she cooks for you in change.

description_ro: Termini scoala si raman bani la fondul clasei.
description_en: You finish school and there are leftover money from the class budget.

description_ro: Primesti subventie sa platesti reparatia calculatorului de la serviciu, dar il repari singur si pastrezi restul.
description_en: You receive a grant to pay work computer repair, but you repair it yourself and keep the change.

description_ro: Te alearga un caine pana la START.
description_en: A dog chases you to the START.

description_ro: Au venit facturile pe tot anul la proprietati. Platesti 40 pentru fiecare casa detinuta si 115 pentru fiecare hotel.
description_en: Annual invoices for all properties. Pay 40 for each house and 115 for each hotel you own

description_ro: Se plang toti vecinii ca asculti muzica tare noaptea si te baga in inchisoare de data asta.
description_en: All your neighbors say that you listen to very loud music at night and you go to jail this time.

description_ro: Prietenul tau se face avocat si te scapa de inchisoare pe gratis o singura data. Nu poti ajuta alti jucatori.
description_en: Your friend becomes lawyer and helps you one time if you are accused. You can't help other players.
